messages.content: ComfyUI-Assistant is a one-stop plugin that provides everything you need to get started with ComfyUI.
You can install ComfyUI-Assistant by searching for it in the ComfyUI Manager and installing it from there.
Who is the main community developer of ComfyUI-Assistant?
The main community developer of ComfyUI-Assistant is Matan.
How can you support the main community developer, Matan?
You can support Matan by visiting their Buy Me a Coffee page, which is linked in the documentation.
What does ComfyUI-Assistant provide for users?
ComfyUI-Assistant provides everything you need to get started with ComfyUI.
Is ComfyUI-Assistant an official ComfyUI plugin?
The documentation does not specify whether ComfyUI-Assistant is an official ComfyUI plugin or a third-party plugin.
Does ComfyUI-Assistant require any additional dependencies?
The documentation does not mention any additional dependencies required for using ComfyUI-Assistant.
